name: Espresso
details: Made from a blend of premium Arabica beans, roasted to perfection for a rich and intense flavor.

name: Colombian Supremo
details: Sourced from the high-altitude regions of Colombia, offering a smooth and balanced taste with floral undertones.

name: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe
details: Features distinctive floral and citrus notes, harvested from the birthplace of coffee in Ethiopia.

name: French Roast
details: A classic French roast with a deep, smoky flavor profile and a bold finish.

name: Costa Rican Tarrazu
details: Grown in the renowned Tarrazu region of Costa Rica, this coffee offers a vibrant acidity and hints of citrus.

name: Sumatra Mandheling
details: Known for its earthy flavors and low acidity, this coffee from Sumatra boasts a syrupy body and complex aroma.

name: Kenyan AA
details: This Kenyan AA coffee is characterized by its bright acidity, wine-like flavors, and rich aroma.

name: Brazilian Santos
details: With its nutty sweetness and mild acidity, Brazilian Santos offers a smooth and satisfying cup.

name: Guatemalan Antigua
details: Grown in the volcanic soils of Antigua, Guatemala, this coffee features a rich chocolatey flavor with spicy undertones.

name: Rwanda Bourbon
details: Packed with floral aromas and juicy flavors, this Rwandan coffee showcases the unique characteristics of the Bourbon variety.

name: Mexican Chiapas
details: From the Chiapas region of Mexico, this coffee offers a well-balanced flavor profile with nutty undertones and a smooth finish.

name: Panama Geisha
details: Renowned for its floral and tea-like qualities, Panama Geisha is a rare and prized coffee variety.

name: Tanzanian Peaberry
details: With its unique pea-shaped beans, Tanzanian Peaberry offers a bright acidity and citrusy notes.

name: Hawaiian Kona
details: Grown in the rich volcanic soil of Hawaii, Kona coffee is prized for its smooth, mellow flavor with hints of nuttiness.

name: Vietnamese Robusta
details: Known for its strong and intense flavor, Vietnamese Robusta offers a bold and robust coffee experience.
